trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor base class for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Gir et redigeringsprogram for komponenten basisklasse for Web-serverkontroller som er avledet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A component editor provides a user interface for editing the properties of a control.
trans-unit.target: Et redigeringsprogram for komponenten inneholder et brukergrensesnitt for å redigere egenskapene til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Component editors are invoked from control designers by using the **Property Builder** menu item from the context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten inndata startes fra kontrollen utviklere ved hjelp av den **egenskapen Builder** menyelement på hurtigmenyen kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Component editors that are derived from the BaseDataListComponentEditor class are invoked from designers derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class, and are used to edit the properties of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten inndata som er avledet fra klassen BaseDataListComponentEditor startes fra utviklere som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>klassen, og brukes til å redigere egenskapene til kontrollene som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For examples of such controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: Eksempler på slike kontroller, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method displays a component editor for the associated control, if one can be created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>metoden viser en komponent redigeringsprogrammet for den tilknyttede kontrollen hvis en kan opprettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> method returns the index of the initial page to be displayed in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A>metoden returnerer indeksen for den første siden som vises i redigeringsprogrammet for komponenten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class creates a component editor that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class, when the user selects **Property Builder** from the context menu within the designer.
trans-unit.target: En designer som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>klassen oppretter et redigeringsprogram for komponent som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>klassen når brukeren velger **egenskapen Builder** på hurtigmenyen i utformeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The index in the array of page control types, of the initial page to display.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i matrisen for siden kontrolltypene til startsiden for visning.

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified component by using the specified context descriptor and parent window.
trans-unit.target: Redigerer den angitte komponenten ved hjelp av angitte konteksten sikkerhetsbeskrivelse og overordnet vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method gets a <xref:System.Type> array of page control types by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>metoden henter en <xref:System.Type>rekke siden kontrolltypene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> object, and then calls its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> method to display the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Det opprettes en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>objektet, og deretter Kall den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A>metode for å vise redigeringsprogrammet for komponenten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> objekt som kan brukes til å få ytterligere kontekstinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>, which represents the component to edit.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>implementere den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>, som representerer komponenten vil</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> that represents the parent window.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"> </xref> som representerer det overordnede vinduet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> the component was successfully edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>komponenten ble redigert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the initial page to display in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den første siden som skal vises i redigeringsprogrammet for komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The initial page is specified when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Startsiden angis når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>objekt er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the initial page in the array.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den første siden i matrisen.
